featured.text: Those who have positive feelings about their stuck songs prefer to just “let them be,” while those with negative feelings turn to more behavioral responses, which include coping strategies such as singing, talking, or even praying. 49.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

definition.zh_def: 無法移動或脫離某個地方或狀態。
definition.en_def: Unable to move or be moved; fixed in place.
definition.example: The car got stuck in the mud.
